Posts.Content: hi!   I'm mila,female,25 years old, indonesia. i had mastectomy at the right side 2 years ago.i had done the operation at singapore. i had chemoteraphy and radiation. i had 6 packets chemoteraphy, each chemoteraphy include 3 times chemotheraphy,so the total of chemoteraphy is 18 times and 30 times of radiation. my problem now is after the chemoteraphy done, my ca maker is going up again.I dont know what happen.Everyday I had a glass of juice(apple, carrot, n bitroot) and much of supplement. i done my chemoteraphy a year ago. and now the doctor said that i should take chemoteraphy again.but i dont want it.i want look the other opinion, coz i know that the chemo isn't good to my body. Now i had backpain too. friend can you help me?what should i do?
Posts.Title: ca maker is going up again after chemoteraphy done
